title: Android 10 update breaks internet access (wifi/sim) on pixel 3
content:
Hi,

After upgrading to android 10 on my pixel 3 I randomly loose internet access over wifi and SIM data.
I doesn't seem to happen while I use the phone but when I pick it up  after idling.

Disconnecting and reconnecting to wifi doesn't help. I have to completely reboot my phone :/

Is there a fix for this besides a factory reset ? :/
